title: Thucydides – the final
author: VD
content_html:
Here’s the final exam. 25 questions. If you’re able to pass this, then you can be comfortable that you have a fairly sound understanding of the events and characters that Thucydides describes in his history of the Peloponnesian War. It’s designed to be a bit easier than the Book quizzes, so don’t go overboard in looking for trick questions and so forth. This marks the end of the first Voxiversity experiment.

Take the test and be sure to let us know how you did in the comments here. It may be worth noting that discussions of the next Voxiversity subject will be somewhat tilted towards those who stuck with the program this time.

Quizzes and Final Exam

The History of the Peloponnesian War 1.1 to 1.115.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 1.116 to 2.46.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 2.47 to 2.103.

The History of the Peloponnesian War Book Three.

The History of the Peloponnesian War Book Four.

The History of the Peloponnesian War Book Five.

The History of the Peloponnesian War Book Six

The History of the Peloponnesian War Book Seven.

The History of the Peloponnesian War Book Eight

The History of the Peloponnesian War Comprehensive Final Exam
content_text:
Here’s the final exam.  25 questions.  If you’re able to pass this, then you can be comfortable that you have a fairly sound understanding of the events and characters that Thucydides describes in his history of the Peloponnesian War.  It’s designed to be a bit easier than the Book quizzes, so don’t go overboard in looking for trick questions and so forth.  This marks the end of the first Voxiversity experiment.
Take the test
and be sure to let us know how you did in the comments here.  It may be worth noting that discussions of the next Voxiversity subject will be somewhat tilted towards those who stuck with the program this time.
